sub_fields.label: Include Pre-content Block
sub_fields.name: inc_pre_content_block
sub_fields.instructions: Check to display content block before main content section. Useful for adding headers and section introductory information.

sub_fields.label: Pre-content Block
sub_fields.name: pre_content_block
sub_fields.instructions: This content will be displayed before main section content.

sub_fields.label: Include Post-content Block
sub_fields.name: inc_post_content_block
sub_fields.instructions: Check to display content block after main content section.

sub_fields.label: Post-content Block
sub_fields.name: post_content_block
sub_fields.instructions: This content will be displayed after main section content.

sub_fields.label: List Type
sub_fields.name: list_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select from the list of available styles to change list type of block. Leave blank for standard bullets.

sub_fields.label: Gradient
sub_fields.name: gradient
sub_fields.instructions: Checking box will apply a gradient using solid 'background color' as start and transparent white as end.

sub_fields.label: FIlter by Post Type
sub_fields.name: filter_by_post_type
sub_fields.instructions: If value set, the post options below will be filtered by selected option.

sub_fields.label: Show Posts
sub_fields.name: show_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Select Posts to show in grid. Note if filter above selected, this list will be filtered by posts in that specific post type.

sub_fields.label: Swap image and text
sub_fields.name: swap_image_and_text
sub_fields.message: Swap image and text columns on small devices

choices.duplicate_text: Use first slide text for all slides

sub_fields.label: Filter By
sub_fields.name: filter_by
sub_fields.instructions: Apply a filter to fine tune displayed reviews. E.g. Featured posts only.

sub_fields.label: Reviews Per Slide
sub_fields.name: reviews_per_slide
sub_fields.instructions: Set amount of reviews to show per slide.

sub_fields.label: Rows
sub_fields.name: rows
sub_fields.instructions: Set how many rows you would like displayed within the carousel.

sub_fields.label: Limit
sub_fields.name: limit
sub_fields.instructions: Add a limit on how many reviews to load. Setting this number to 0 will remove any limit.
